vclaim: The Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 says that non-citizens who vote must be deported.
title: Does a 1996 U.S. Law Say Non-Citizens Who Vote Must Be Deported?
subtitle: The Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 deemed non-citizens convicted of voting unlawfully to be "deportable."
author: David Emery
